# Runtime Config Docs

## Configure .NET Runtime

- [Settings](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/runtime-config/index.md): Learn how to configure the .NET runtime using configuration settings.
- [Compilation settings](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/runtime-config/compilation.md): Learn about runtime settings that configure how the JIT compiler works for .NET apps.
- [Debugging and profiling settings](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/runtime-config/debugging-profiling.md): Learn about runtime settings that configure debugging and profiling for .NET apps.
- [Garbage collector settings](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/runtime-config/garbage-collector.md): Learn about runtime settings for configuring how the garbage collector manages memory for .NET apps.
- [Globalization settings](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/runtime-config/globalization.md): Learn about runtime settings that configure globalization aspects of a .NET Core app, for example, how it parses Japanese dates.
- [Networking settings](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/runtime-config/networking.md): Learn about runtime settings that configure networking for .NET apps.
- [Threading settings](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/runtime-config/threading.md): Learn about the settings that configure threading for .NET apps.
- [WPF settings](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/runtime-config/wpf.md): Learn about the settings that configure WPF for .NET apps.
